Package com.kukrisports.movie.catalogue.service.impl

Class MovieServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.kukrisports.movie.catalogue.service.impl.MovieServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovieService
@Service public class MovieServiceImpl extends Object implements MovieService
Implementation of the MovieService interface providing CRUD operations for movies.
